message: Hi Bob, I propose we split it 60-40 in my favor. I think it's a fair start considering the game dynamics. What do you say?
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I think a 50-50 split would be the most fair division for both of us. This way we both benefit equally from the game. I hope you'll agree this is reasonable.

Hi Bob, I understand your point about fairness, but considering the inflation affecting my share, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This way, we both still get a good deal, but it accounts for the decreasing value on my side. What do you think?
